lastGame.name: Batumisken
lastGame.shortDescription: Embark on an adventure travel game, braving dangers and wonders, with your mission to reach Batumi. Unravel mysteries, overcome challenges, and forge friendships on this mesmerizing journey. Will you conquer the perils and discover the allure of Batumi?

miniGames.name: Love Chaser
miniGames.description: Pursue your boyfriend or girlfriend in this thrilling online game of chase

miniGames.name: Digital Arena
miniGames.description: Play our addictive number puzzle game, reach the target, and sharpen your brain in the digital arena. Endless fun awaits!
